description:
This is an English translation and configurations edit.

Before me this was Edited by Rex. 
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1775454137

Original work by GEEKiDoS:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1551961057

My contributions:
    > English translation of months, day numbers, config settings, JavaScript comments.
    > Added Clock 12 hour time setting
    > Re-designed the "phone text" setting's format into a more understandable one (explained below)

How to change phone text:
The phone screen's text can be set for each hour of the day with the format: "HOUR:TEXT,HOUR:TEXT" (without quotations). 
For example "0:AM, 12:PM" will make all hours 0-11 print AM and all hours 12-23 print PM. 
If you would like to put static (non-changing) text, use "0:TEXT". For example "0:Hi".
title: Anime Time/Calendar/Audio [ENGLISH]
